name: B@BY
description:
We made this game during the 2020's Global Game Jam.

In this management game you play B@BY a small robot abandonned to their fate who has the heavy responsibility of rebuilding the robot society

Controls

A / D : move

Left click  : interact

Esc / Tab : Menu

The Team :

(Programmer) Alexandre Brodu : https://wardcore.itch.io/

(Game Designer) Theo Bacoux

(Game Designer) Benjamin Pochard

(3D Artist) Roxane Amouyal

(3D Artist) Gaethan Bercet : https://www.artstation.com/gathanbercet

(3D Artist) Laura Molina : https://www.artstation.com/lauramolina83
